tool_description:
Calculate muslim prayertimes via an simple to use api, apparently the api docs does not render so i would recommend checking out our github at https://github.com/javadsm/salah.

name: salah
title: salah

api_list.name: gettimes
api_list.description: Only api endpoint, gets times for current date

required_parameters.name: date
required_parameters.description: Format is {month} {day} {year}, you can use any delimiter you want such as - / or :

optional_parameters.name: method
optional_parameters.description: Default is MWL see API documentation for more
